product.title: LANFENG 3-in-1 hot air styler and rotating hair dryer, Hot Air Styler and Rotating Brush, rotating hair dryer brush spinning, Hot Air Styler and 360 Rotating Hair Dryer for Dry Hair, Curl Hair (Pink)
product.title_excluding_brand: 3-in-1 hot air styler and rotating hair dryer, Hot Air Styler and Rotating Brush, rotating hair dryer brush spinning, Hot Air Styler and 360 Rotating Hair Dryer for Dry Hair, Curl Hair (Pink)
product.description: 【Versatile Styling Tool】Our 3 in 1 hot air styler and rotating brush combines the functionality of a straightening brush, curling iron, and hairdryer. With two interchangeable brushes, it offers endless styling options. The larger barrel adds volume and smoothness to thick hair, while the smaller barrel creates effortless natural looks and soft waves. 【Gentle Heat for Hair】Our rotating hair dryer brush prioritizes the of your hair. With its customizable heat control, you can choose the ideal temperature setting that suits your hair type and styling needs. The option to switch between hot, warm, and cool settings ensures gentle heat application, minimizing the risk of heat damage and promoting, more vibrant locks. Enjoy beautiful hairstyles. 【360-Degree Freedom of Styling 】Featuring a 360-degree rotating brush head and adjustable power cord, our rotatable hair curler brush allows you to design your hair from any angle, ensuring convenience and safety. Enjoy worry-free home styling that rivals professional salons. Achieve your desired hairstyle effortlessly, whether it's voluminous curls, sleek straight locks, or extra bounce and shine. 【Customizable Heat Control】Our rotating hair dryer brush offers three temperature settings - hot, warm, and cool, catering to various hair types and styles. Its bi-directional rotation mechanism effortlessly creates natural-looking curls, providing you with the salon-worthy appearance you desire. 【Salon-Quality Results at Home】Say goodbye to expensive salon visits and welcome gorgeous hair in the comfort of your own home. Our negative ion hair styler comb offers professional-grade performance combined with user-friendly features, giving you the power to create stunning hairstyles with ease.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
